attributes.action: Heavy fine for drivers parking in Parent & Child Car Park Spaces, when they don't have a baby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heavy fines (or points) for drivers parking in Parent & Child or disabled spaces when they clearly don't fill the criteria to park in them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
